Package org.hibernate.search.mapper.pojo.work.spi

Interface PojoWorkMappingContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BackendMappingContext, BridgeMappingContext
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PojoScopeMappingContext, PojoSearchSessionMappingContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface PojoWorkMappingContext
extends BackendMappingContext, BridgeMappingContext
